description: Defines and configures hash preprocessing routines referenced by AMGS artifact strategies. Ensures integrity checks use verifiable and consistent pre-hashing transformations.

NONE.description: No preprocessing applied. Raw file content is hashed.

JSON_STRIP_COMMENTS.description: Removes C-style comments (// and /* */) from JSON files before hashing.

SOURCE_NORMALIZE.description: Standardizes source code whitespace/encoding to ensure byte-for-byte reproducibility regardless of development environment linting.
